Texts.Chs: 一个远古神器、一个沃尔坦核心、一个未知能量核心
Texts.Eng: Elder Artifact x 1 , Valtan Casing x 1, Unknown Reactor x1

Texts.Chs: 这是来自于黑暗之中的另一种恐怖，如果你打算获得这种武器，请在祭坛献上以下物品：
Texts.Eng: Terror comes from the dark one in many forms. This deadly weapon is one of the things you ought to fear. Pray to Him and place upon the altar the following:
